rules.justification: Specifying the Obsolete Reason is a good practice, but usage of obsolete tags isn't enforced in AppSource submissions.
[Evergreen] Removing a page customization, an entitlement, or a control add-in is allowed for partners because AL does not support obsoleting them.
This is an Info diagnostic about IDs being out of range, mainly for enum extension values (which is often due to constraints from dataverse integration).
